      • showImage

        public static void showImage(com.xnx3.media.CaptchaUtil captchaUtil,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                      throws IOException
        显示图片验证码，直接创建出jpg格式图片
        参数:
        captchaUtil - CaptchaUtil 可对其自定义验证码图片的属性、显示、格式等
        request - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        抛出:
        IOException

      • showImage

        public static void showImage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                      throws IOException
        显示图片验证码，直接创建出jpg格式图片

        request - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        抛出:
        IOException

      • compare

        public static BaseVO compare(String inputCode,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        用户输入的验证码，与系统存储的进行比较，返回结果
        参数:
        inputCode - 用户输入的验证码
        request - HttpServletRequest 主要用于从其中获取Session
        返回:
        BaseVO
